name: Neighbours Revenge
description:
DRILLING, LOUD music, deafening SNORING, endlessly CRYING kids... Sounds familiar?

NOW IT'S REVENGE TIME!

**IRRITATE the guy in the central apartment**
**Involve ALL RESIDENTS of the building**
**Fill the bar on top of the screen**

**CONGRATS, you've finally DRIVEN your neighbour MAD!**


Neighbours Revenge – show them no mercy!
